grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 舞台裏【ブタイウラ】offstage, backstage, behind the scenes
舞台【ブタイ】stage (theatre, theater), scene or setting (e.g. of novel, play, etc.)
kun reading compounds: 舞う【まう】to dance (orig. a whirling dance), to flutter about, to revolve
舞い上がる【まいあがる】to soar, to fly high, to be whirled up, to make merry, to be ecstatic, to be in high spirits
立ち居振る舞い【たちいふるまい】movements, behavior, behaviour, bearing, deportment, manners, demeanor
獅子舞【ししまい】lion dance, traditional dance performed by one or more dancers wearing a guardian lion costume
